Quote: Ideas should only become expensive when they work
Insanity is doing the same thing over & over expecting different results
Customers do not appear in our processes, we appear in their experiences
Tact is the ability to tell someone to go to hell in such a way that they look forward to the trip
I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
If I had asked people what they wanted, they would have said faster horses
People don't know what they want until they see what they don't want
All models are wrong, but some are useful
Well done is better than well said
Never mistake activity for achievement
Don't wait. The time will never be just right.
Our distrust is very expensive
Nobody will believe in you unless you believe in yourself
Don't ruin the present with the ruined past
Experience is simply the name we give our mistakes
The truest wisdom is a resolute determination
We must become the change we want to see
Fortune favours the brave
I destroy my enemies when I make them my friends
A good decision is based on knowledge and not on numbers
Price is what you pay. Value is what you get.
Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can't lose.
